languages.text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} мастера-тактика, Тактическое преимущество, позволяет ему получать очки способности каждый раз, когда он или его союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}. Мастер-тактик получает количество очков, равное 20% от всего полученного моментума (т. е. 1 очко за каждые 5 моментума). Мастер-тактик начинает бой с количеством очков, равным его {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусу{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Ключевая активная способность мастера-тактика, Дополнительное преимущество, усиливает его следующую атаку, нанося 4% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждое очко тактического преимущества, которое есть у мастера-тактика, но тратит половину очков тактического преимущества (округляется в большую сторону). {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} мастера-тактика позволяет ему выбрать 3×3 зону на поле боя. Все союзники мастера-тактика (включая его самого), которые имеют прямую видимость хотя бы одного врага в выбранной зоне и могут достичь хотя бы одного врага выбранным в данный момент оружием, немедленно проводят одиночную атаку по случайному противнику из числа тех, которых они могут выбрать целью в этой зоне. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} мастера-тактика: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, Общительность, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} мастера-тактика: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}.

The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.
languages.original_text: Ключевая пассивная способность тактика, Тактическое преимущество, позволяет ему получать очки способности каждый раз, когда он или его союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g}. Тактик получает количество очков, равное 20% от всего полученного моментума (т. е. 1 очко на каждые 5 моментума). Тактик начинает бой с количеством очков, равным его бонусу Общительности. Ключевая активная способность тактика, Дополнительное преимущество, усиливает его следующую атаку, нанося 4% дополнительного урона за каждое очко тактического преимущества, которое есть у тактика, но тратит половину очков тактического преимущества (округляется в большую сторону). Героический акт тактика позволяет ему выбрать 3×3 зону на поле боя. Все союзники тактика (включая его самого), которые имеют прямую видимость хотя бы одного врага в выбранной зоне и могут достичь хотя бы одного врага выбранным в данный момент оружием, немедленно проводят одиночную атаку по случайному противнику, которых они могут выбрать целью в этой зоне. Важные характеристики тактика: Ближний Бой, Дальний Бой, Ловкость, Общительность, Воля. Навыки охотника: Медицина, Взрывотехника, Убеждение, Знания: Империум.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician's passive keystone ability, Tactical Advantage, grants them stacks of the effect of the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Tactician starts the combat with a number of stacks equal to their Fellowship bonus. The Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more damage for each stack of tactical advantage on the Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Tactician's heroic act lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Tactician's allies (including the Tactician themselves) who have a line of sight to at least one enemy within the selected area and can hit at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Fellowship, Willpower. Skills: Medicae, Demolition, Persuasion, Lore (Imperium).

The Tactician's passive keystone ability, Tactical Advantage, grants them stacks of the effect of the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Tactician starts the combat with a number of stacks equal to their Fellowship bonus. The Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more damage for each stack of tactical advantage on the Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Tactician's heroic act lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Tactician's allies (including the Tactician themselves) who have a line of sight to at least one enemy within the selected area and can hit at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Fellowship, Willpower. Skills: Medicae, Demolition, Persuasion, Lore (Imperium).

The Tactician's passive keystone ability, Tactical Advantage, grants the Tactician stacks of a unique effect by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their Fellowship bonus. The Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more damage for each stack of tactical advantage on the Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Tactician's heroic act lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Tactician's allies (including the Tactician themselves) who have line of sight to at least one enemy within the selected area and can hit at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Fellowship, Willpower. Skills: Medicae, Demolition, Persuasion, Lore (Imperium).

The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: Die passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Meistertaktikers, Taktischer Vorteil, gewährt dem Meistertaktiker Stapel eines einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} mit demselben Namen, immer wenn er oder seine Verbündeten an {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} gewinnen. Dem Meistertaktiker wird eine Anzahl an Stapeln entsprechend 20 % der erhaltenen Dynamik gewährt (d. h. 1 Stapel für je 5 Dynamik). Der Meistertaktiker beginnt den Kampf mit einer Anzahl an Stapeln entsprechend seinem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschafts{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Die aktive wesentliche Fähigkeit des Meistertaktikers, Den Vorteil ausweiten, ermächtigt seinen nächsten Angriff und lässt ihn +4 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} pro Stapel Taktischer Vorteil beim Meistertaktiker zufügen. Danach wird die Hälfte der Stapel entfernt (aufgerundet). Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Meistertaktikers lässt ihn einen 3×3-Bereich auf dem Schlachtfeld auswählen. Alle Verbündeten des Meistertaktikers (einschließlich des Meistertaktikers selbst), die eine {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu mindestens einem Feind innerhalb des gewählten Bereichs haben und mindestens einen Feind mit der aktuell getragenen Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} können, vollziehen sofort einen einzelnen Angriff auf einen zufälligen Feind, den sie in diesem Bereich anvisieren können. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, Gefolgschaft, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Taktikers, Taktischer Vorteil, gewährt dem Taktiker Stapel eines einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} mit demselben Namen, immer wenn er oder seine Verbündeten an {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} gewinnen. Dem Taktiker wird eine Anzahl an Stapeln entsprechend 20 % der erhaltenen Dynamik gewährt (d. h. 1 Stapel für je 5 Dynamik). Der Taktiker beginnt den Kampf mit einer Anzahl an Stapeln entsprechend seinem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschafts{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Die aktive wesentliche Fähigkeit des Taktikers, Den Vorteil ausweiten, ermächtigt seinen nächsten Angriff und lässt ihn +4 % mehr Schaden pro Stapel Taktischer Vorteil beim Taktiker zufügen. Danach wird die Hälfte der Stapel entfernt (aufgerundet). Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Taktikers lässt ihn einen 3×3-Bereich auf dem Schlachtfeld auswählen. Alle Verbündeten des Taktikers (einschließlich des Taktikers selbst), die eine {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu mindestens einem Feind innerhalb des gewählten Bereichs haben und mindestens einen Feind mit der aktuell getragenen Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g} können, vollziehen sofort einen einzelnen Angriff auf einen zufälligen Feind, den sie in diesem Bereich anvisieren können. Schlüsseleigenschaften: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, Gefolgschaft, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé du Tacticien, Avantage Tactique, lui confère des cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} unique du même nom chaque fois que lui ou ses alliés acquièrent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. Le Tacticien bénéficie d'un nombre de cumuls égal à 20 % de la fougue acquise (soit 1 cumul par tranche de 5 points de fougue). Le Tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls égal à son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}. La capacité active clé du Tacticien, Exploitation de l'Avantage, renforce son attaque suivante, lui permettant d'infliger +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par cumul d'avantage tactique, puis supprime la moitié de ces cumuls (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du Tacticien lui permet de sélectionner une zone de 3×3 sur le champ de bataille. Tous les alliés du Tacticien (lui compris) bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} sur au moins un ennemi dans la zone sélectionnée et capables d'{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}atteindre{/g} au moins un ennemi avec l'arme dont ils sont équipés lancent immédiatement une attaque unique contre un ennemi aléatoire qu'ils peuvent cibler dans cette zone. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, Sociabilité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}.

The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé du Tacticien, Avantage Tactique, lui confère des cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} unique du même nom chaque fois que lui ou ses alliés acquièrent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}. Le Tacticien bénéficie d'un nombre de cumuls égal à 20 % de la fougue acquise (soit 1 cumul par tranche de 5 points de fougue). Le Tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls égal à son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g}. La capacité active clé du Tacticien, Exploitation de l'Avantage, renforce son attaque suivante, lui permettant d'infliger +4 % de dégâts supplémentaires par cumul d'avantage tactique, puis supprime la moitié de ces cumuls (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du Tacticien lui permet de sélectionner une zone de 3×3 sur le champ de bataille. Tous les alliés du Tacticien (lui compris) bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} sur au moins un ennemi dans la zone sélectionnée et capables d{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteindre{/g} au moins un ennemi avec l'arme dont ils sont équipés lancent immédiatement une attaque unique contre un ennemi aléatoire qu'ils peuvent cibler dans cette zone. Caractéristiques clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétences d'Arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, Fraternité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}.

languages.text: 战术专家的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：战术优势，每当战术专家或盟友获得士气时，战术专家都会获得1层“战术优势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。 战术专家获得的“战术优势”层数，等同于获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}值的20%，即：每获得5点士气，获得1层效果。战术专家在战斗开始时也会获得“战术专家”层数，等同于战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 战术专家的关键主动能力：扩大优势，可以使下次攻击造成更高伤害。每有1层“战术优势”层数，接下来的攻击便会额外造成4%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，之后失去所有“战术优势”层数的一半（向上取整）。 战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。之后，战术专家的所有盟友（包括战术专家本人），如果在该片区域的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内至少能看到一名敌人，而且至少可以{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}攻击到一名敌人，则会立刻瞄准该片区域内的一名随机敌人，进行一次攻击。 {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}关键属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}社交{/g}、意志。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：战术优势，每当战术专家或盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}时，战术专家都会获得1层“战术优势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。 战术专家获得的“战术优势”层数，等同于获得士气值的20%，即：每获得5点士气，获得1层效果。战术专家在战斗开始时也会获得“战术专家”层数，等同于战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 战术专家的关键主动能力：扩大优势，可以使下次攻击造成更高伤害。每有1层“战术优势”层数，接下来的攻击便会额外造成4%伤害，之后失去所有“战术优势”层数的一半（向上取整）。 战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。之后，战术专家的所有盟友（包括战术专家本人），如果在该片区域的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内至少能看到一名敌人，而且至少可以攻击到一名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}则会立刻瞄准该片区域内的一名随机敌人，进行一次攻击。 关键属性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、社交、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los maestros tácticos, Ventaja táctica, concede acumulaciones de un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} exclusivo con su mismo nombre siempre que el maestro táctico en cuestión o sus aliados obtengan {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. El número de acumulaciones que recibe el maestro táctico equivale a un 20 % del ímpetu obtenido (es decir, 1 acumulación por cada 5 puntos de ímpetu). Al inicio del combate, tendrá una serie de acumulaciones que equivaldrá a su {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. La capacidad activa clave de los maestros tácticos, Tomar la delantera, hace que su siguiente ataque inflija +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada acumulación de Ventaja táctica que tenga el táctico en cuestión. Hecho esto, elimina la mitad de las acumulaciones (redondeada hacia arriba). El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los maestros tácticos les permite seleccionar un área de 3×3 en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados del maestro táctico en cuestión (incluido él mismo) cuya {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} contenga a al menos un enemigo dentro del área seleccionada y puedan {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a al menos un enemigo con su arma pueden realizar un único ataque contra un enemigo al azar que puedan marcar como objetivo dentro de dicha área. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, Empatía, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}.
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los tácticos, Ventaja táctica, concede acumulaciones de un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} exclusivo con su mismo nombre, siempre que el táctico en cuestión o sus aliados obtengan {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}. El número de acumulaciones que recibe el táctico equivale a un 20 % del ímpetu obtenido (por ejemplo, 1 acumulación por cada 5 puntos de ímpetu). Al inicio del combate, tendrá una serie de acumulaciones que equivaldrá a su {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}empatía{/g}. La capacidad activa clave de los tácticos, Tomar la delantera, hace que su siguiente ataque inflija +4 % de daño adicional por cada acumulación de Ventaja táctica que tenga el táctico en cuestión. Hecho esto, elimina la mitad de las acumulaciones (previo redondeo). El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los tácticos les permite seleccionar un área de 3×3 en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados del táctico en cuestión (incluido él mismo) cuya {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} contenga a al menos un enemigo dentro del área seleccionada y puedan {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} a al menos un enemigo con su arma pueden realizar un único ataque contra un enemigo al azar que puedan marcar como objetivo dentro de dicha área. Características relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, Empatía, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}.

languages.original_text: The tactician's key passive ability, Tactical Advantage, allows him to gain ability points each time he or his allies receive {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The tactician receives a number of points equal to 20% of all the Momentum received (i.e. 1 point for every 5 Momentum). The tactician begins combat with a number of points equal to his Sociability bonus. The tactician's key active ability, Extra Advantage, enhances his next attack by dealing 4% extra damage for every point tactical advantage that the tactician has, but wastes half of his tactical advantage points (rounded up). The tactician's heroic act allows him to choose a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All of the tactician's allies (including himself) who have direct line of sight to at least one enemy in the selected zone and can reach at least one enemy with their currently selected weapon immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target in that zone. Important Tactician Traits: Close Combat, Ranged Combat, Dexterity, Sociability, Will. Hunter Skills: Medicine, Explosive Engineering, Persuasion, Knowledge: Imperium.

traits.locale_text: La habilidad pasiva clave del táctico, Ventaja táctica, le permite ganar puntos de habilidad cada vez que él o sus aliados reciben {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}. El táctico recibe un número de puntos igual al 20% de todo el ímpetu recibido (es decir, 1 punto por cada 5 de ímpetu). El táctico comienza el combate con un número de puntos igual a su bonificador de Sociabilidad. La habilidad activa clave del táctico, Ventaja Extra, mejora su siguiente ataque infligiendo un 4% de daño extra por cada punto de ventaja táctica que tenga el táctico, pero gasta la mitad de sus puntos de ventaja táctica (redondeando hacia arriba). El acto heroico del táctico le permite elegir una zona de 3×3 en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados del táctico (incluido él mismo) que tengan línea de visión directa con al menos un enemigo en la zona seleccionada y puedan alcanzar al menos a un enemigo con su arma seleccionada en ese momento realizan inmediatamente un único ataque contra un enemigo aleatorio al que puedan apuntar en esa zona. Rasgos tácticos importantes: Combate cuerpo a cuerpo, Combate a distancia, Destreza, Sociabilidad, Voluntad. Habilidades de Cazador: Medicina, Ingeniería explosiva, Persuasión, Conocimiento: Imperium.

languages.text: 戦略の達人の重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の戦術的優位では、戦略の達人またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}推進力{/g}を得るたびに戦略家{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}固有の効果{/g}のスタックを獲得する。 戦略の達人は得られた推進力の20％に相当する数のスタックを獲得する（例えば、推進力5を得るごとに1スタック）。戦略の達人は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と同等の数のスタックがある状態で戦闘を開始する。 戦略の達人の重要なアクティブアビリティである優位の促進は次の攻撃を強化し、戦略家の戦術的優位の1スタックにつき{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が4％増加すが、これらスタックの半分を消費する（端数切り上げ）。 戦略の達人が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使すると戦場の3×3エリアを選択できる。選択されたエリア内の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線上{/g}に敵が1体以上いる戦略の達人の味方全員戦略の達人も含めた全員）はその時使用している武器で1体以上の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}することができ、このエリア内で標的にできるランダムな敵に対して直ちに単回攻撃が可能。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、連帯、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Tactical Advantage, grants the Master Tactician stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name whenever they or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Master Tactician is granted a number of stacks equal to 20% of the momentum gained (i.e. 1 stack for every 5 momentum). The Master Tactician starts combat with a number of stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Master Tactician's active keystone ability Press the Advantage empowers their next attack, making it deal +4% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of tactical advantage on the Master Tactician, then removes half of these stacks (rounded up). The Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them select a 3×3 area on the battlefield. All of the Master Tactician's allies (including the Master Tactician themselves) who have {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to at least one enemy within the selected area and can {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} at least one enemy with the weapon they are currently wielding immediately make a single attack against a random enemy they can target within this area. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦略家の重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の戦術的優位では、戦略家またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得るたびに戦略家{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}固有の効果{/g}のスタックを獲得できる。 戦略家は得られた推進力の20％に相当する数のスタックを獲得することができる（例えば、推進力5を得るごとにスタックを1獲得できる）。戦略家は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と同等の数のスタックがある状態で戦闘を開始できる。 戦略家の重要なアクティブアビリティである優位の促進では次の攻撃を強化し、スタックの半分を消費して戦略家の戦術的優位の1スタックにつきダメージを4％増加できる（端数は切り上げ）。 戦略家が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使すると戦場の3×3エリアを選択できる。選択されたエリア内の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線上{/g}に敵が1体以上いる戦略家の味方全員（戦略家も含めた全員）は、その時使用している武器で1体以上の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}することができ、このエリア内で標的にできるランダムな敵に対して直ちに単回攻撃が可能。 主要能力：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、連帯、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}。
